tool_description: Traces the manuscript lineage and textual transmission history of scriptural passages, identifying source manuscripts and textual families that influenced different translations.

text_versions.description: Different textual versions to trace manuscript origins

translation_names.description: Names of translations corresponding to each text version

include_early_manuscripts.description: Include information about early manuscript sources

error_messages: Array length mismatch: text_versions and translation_names must have the same length.
Insufficient versions: At least one text version is required for analysis.
Too many versions: Maximum 8 text versions can be processed simultaneously.
Unknown translation: One or more translation names not recognized in manuscript database.
Text version too short: Each text version must contain sufficient content for analysis.
usage: Provide text versions with corresponding translation names. Enable options for early manuscript inclusion and textual family analysis. Returns manuscript lineage and transmission history information.

manuscript_sources.description: Primary manuscript sources for each translation

textual_families.description: Manuscript family classifications for each version

transmission_notes.description: Notes on textual transmission and preservation

reliability_assessment.description: Assessment of textual reliability for each version
